Magnetics

Our magnetic separators are of superior design to efficiently recover magnetic material and are available in several types.

Depending on your requirement, MincoTech supplies and services both permanent or suspended wet and dry magnetic separators.

Benefits

Low-cost maintenance

Easy operation

Separation selectivity

High capacity

Dry Magnetic Drum Separator

Minco Techâ€™s dry magnetic drum separator is best suited for minerals such as iron ore, beach mineral sand and other industrial materials, where fines arenâ€™t too much of an issue.

Suspended Electro and Permanent Magnets

Minco Tech designs and builds sophisticated magnetic systems to assist with sorting minerals.
